entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
